positive_examples: This is an example of format string attack.
The format string attack demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed format string attack in this context.
A typical case of format string attack would involve these features.
The concept of format string attack applies here.
An attack that exploits improper handling of format string functions to read or write arbitrary memory locations.
negative_examples: This is an example of buffer overflow attack, not format string attack.
This represents memory corruption attack in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: BufferOverflowAttack, or other types of MemoryCorruptionAttack

definition: A security exploit using format string vulnerabilities to read or write memory.
